lines:
23 Apr

1909

Wr. 3. S. La

My dear $in:

Allow me to acknowledge the range of your favor at the 16th insta

eneloping the Dead Drott, Second of Exchange, for five hundead doltar

(500). The Exchange for the s ame duly received and deposited to the 
aer cunt of W. Lue I am besefore returning the Second hacrange bereits 
as also the empy of your fimt letter to on which was and event 
grynowiadred
raw: 23 Apr 1909 Wr. 3. S. La My dear $in: Allow me to acknowledge the range of your favor at the 16th insta eneloping the Dead Drott, Second of Exchange, for five hundead doltar (500). The Exchange for the s ame duly received and deposited to the aer cunt of W. Lue I am besefore returning the Second hacrange bereits as also the empy of your fimt letter to on which was and event grynowiadred

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of Demand Draft, Second of Exchange, for $500, and returning said draft because the first draft was received and deposited.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
